original_text:
It was you who set all the boundaries of the earth;
    you made both summer and winter.
korean_text: 주께서 땅의 경계를 정하시며 주께서 여름과 겨울을 만드셨나이다

sentences.original_text: It was you who set all the boundaries of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 모든 경계를 정하신 분은 당신이셨습니다

sentences.original_text: you made both summer and winter
